item.title: Buying Property in Australia 01: Introduction to Property Type
item.description: It has been nearly one year since I arrived in Australia. There have been lots of changes in the past year. Job interview, IELTS, working visa, resign from Alibaba, move abroad, join a new company, pure English office, end the long-distance relationship with my wife. Then I continued to chasing up permanent residence and finally, I did it in March this year. I’m still not fully relaxed and adapt to that yet.
